title: Create Some Automated Tests
description: This tutorial begins where Form Processing and Cutting Down Our Code left off. We've built a web-poll application, and we'll now create some automated tests for it.

meta.title: Create Automated Tests for Your Django Web Application
meta.description: Learn how to create automated tests for your Django web application, including the benefits and best practices of testing.
meta.keywords: test driven development, python, django commands, django, django online labs, web application, automated testing
